p: For our experiments, we created a dataset of tweets using the Twitter Premium Search API (TPSA) ( https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/search/api-reference/premium-search.html). TPSA allows two key advantages over the free API. It provides full access to historical tweets, while the free API restricts the caller to tweets posted within the last 30 days. TPSA also allows composite search queries that combine location, keyword and date range parameters, while the free API allows calls restricted to one of the parameters (for example, either location or keyword).
